description: Adorably sweet Dalton Briggs is caught checking out screenshots of straight beau, Sean Knight. His friends decide to help out the cutie by setting him up on a blind date. The catch? Sean has no idea he’s really coming over to meet Dalton! The hairy stud is blindfolded as Dalton gets his lips around his big, long cock. When the blindfold is removed, Sean is shocked to find Dalton at the end of his dick, but he’s so hot, bothered and turned on that he let’s Dalton continue and gets right into it returning the favor.
title: Collusion Part 1
